title: WESTSIDE 2 BED 2 BATH TOWNHOUSE PRIVATE POOL
posting_body: ['This two bedroom two bathroom townhouse/duplex has a private pool located on the westside of Petaluma.', 'The three bedroom, two bathroom single-story house is mostly detached from the 2 story townhouse with the exception of one sound proof wall.', 'Upstairs has a high exposed beam ceiling, large living area with a fireplace and a gas wall heater and an alcove that fits a queen bed and two small end tables.', 'The bathroom has a large all tile shower, toilet and two sinks.', 'Enjoy the large private backyard deck upstairs with views of the Sonoma mountains.', 'Downstairs there is a bedroom with new carpeting and bathroom with a deep soaking tub and shower with a gas wall heater.', 'The living room and/or family room also has a gas wall heater and two back up electric wall heaters.', 'There is a large side yard that has a storage shed.', 'The kitchen is also downstairs with new bamboo wood flooring, custom built cabinetry with ample cupboard space and a built-in hutch, granite counter tops, deep stainless-steel sink, garbage disposal, dishwasher, microwave, gas stove/oven, and in the entry way a side-by-side refrigerator with ice maker/water dispenser and stackable washer and dryer.', 'with more custom cabinets and two closets for coats.', 'Top down/bottom up window coverings throughout the townhouse.', 'The backyard is completely private with eight foot tall fencing and a private swimming pool.', 'There is no garage but there is off street parking in a large driveway for two to three vehicles depending on the size.', '$2,700 per month, $2,700 security deposit.', 'No pets (no exceptions).', 'No smoking.', 'If interested, please e-mail or send a text message at', 'show contact info', '.']
